name: DoseUnits
label: Dose Units
description: Indicates the total dose given in units (e.g. of Gray (Gy) when radiation, Millimeters/24hours for medication) (FG:0000759)

name: Setting
label: Setting
description: Indicate the treatment setting, which describes the treatment's purpose in relation to the primary treatment. (NCIT:C124308)

name: ResponseToTreatment
label: Response to Treatment
description: The patients' response to the applied treatment regimen. (SNOMEDCT:182985004)
